constraint: The password shall contain less than 4 characters.
function:
def this_function(s: str) -> bool:
    ''' 
    Check if the password contains less than 4 characters.
    Returns True if the password is less than 4 characters long, otherwise False.
    '''
    return len(s) < 4

constraint: The password shall not contain any of the following characters: !, #, $.
The password shall not contain any upper case characters.
The password shall not contain any lower case characters.
